definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: Large scaled geosciences software systems often use several dozens of types of data.
sentences.chinese: 大型的地质行业软件系统使用到多达几十种数据类型。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the design and realization of the main control software system of the robot glazing system.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了机器人施釉主控软件系统的设计与实现。

sentences.english: Most software systems consist of several concerns that crosscut multiple modules.
sentences.chinese: 大多数软件系统由一些横切多个模块的关注点组成。

sentences.english: The track like data structure which resembles the track layouts in stations, is an important part of a PC based interlocking software system.
sentences.chinese: 站场形数据结构是微机联锁软件系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Boundary classes handle the input and output functions required by a software system.
sentences.chinese: 边界类处理软件系统的输入与输出。

sentences.english: The main functions and the usual architecture of spaceflight control software systems are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍航天飞控软件系统的主要功能及其常规体系结构。

sentences.english: A computer program for DNA and polypeptide sequence analysis was made.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种DNA和多肽链序列分析的软件系统。

sentences.english: SNMP agent is an integrated part of router software system .
sentences.chinese: 路由器网管代理是路由器软件系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: And your strategy relies increasingly on the development and delivery of business software systems.
sentences.chinese: 您的策略越来越多地依赖业务软件系统的开发和交付。

sentences.english: One of the first tasks with any software system is the installation and configuration.
sentences.chinese: 任何软件系统的最初任务之一都是安装和配置。

sentences.english: It was also applied for detailed description of the behaviors of Flight Control Software ( FCS ) using statecharts.
sentences.chinese: 通过仿真验证了飞行控制软件系统功能的正确性。

sentences.english: The engineering image denoising is realized with MATLAB software system.
sentences.chinese: 应用MATLAB软件系统实现工程图像的去噪。

sentences.english: We would like to extend this capability to software systems and architectures.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望将此功能扩展到软件系统和体系结构中。

sentences.english: As an example, an onboard software system is generated from the foundation class library.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出由基本类库生成星载机软件系统的实例。

sentences.english: Independently develop software system of dynamic pressure rise measurement actualized on freeze-dryer.
sentences.chinese: 自主开发出了在冻干机上实施动压法的软件系统。

sentences.english: Incidentally, Observer was used widely in the software system.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，观察器会在软件系统中得到广泛使用。
